name: Bear Party: Adventure
description:
Bear Party: Adventure is a totally free, three hours long, old-school single-player adventure.
Go on a journey to meet the grand wizard and rescue your friend!
Fast-paced combats and movements. Bunnyhop and slaughter your way through armies of evil bears!
Five maps with their own unique and distinct themes, full of areas to explore and secrets.
Most of the campaign is playable in coop, but deathmatch and instagib are also available!
This is a Steam release of a previously released Source mod.
